answerText: Robert Penn Warren[10] Cleanth Brooks took the title of his book The Well Wrought Urn from a line from this poet's "The Canonization." This poet opened one sonnet with the line "Batter my heart, three-personed God."
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Louisville Round 11 | 7 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One of the major school of literary criticism to emerge during the 20th century was the so-called New Criticism. For 10 points each: [10] One author associated with New Criticism was this co-founder of The Southern Review with Cleanth Brooks. He is also known for a novel in which Willie Stark represents Huey Long, All the King's Men.
